#include<iostream>
#define LLI long long int
using namespace std;
#define mod (int)(1e9+7)
struct matrix
{
    LLI a,b,c,d;
};

matrix matMult(matrix x, matrix y)
{
    matrix res;
    res.a=((x.a*y.a)%mod+(x.b*y.c)%mod)%mod;
    res.b=((x.a*y.b)%mod+(x.b*y.d)%mod)%mod;
    res.c=((x.c*y.a)%mod+(x.d*y.c)%mod)%mod;
    res.d=((x.c*y.b)%mod+(x.d*y.d)%mod)%mod;
    return res;
}
matrix pow(matrix Base, LLI exp)
{
    matrix res;
    res.a=res.d=1;
    res.b=res.c=0;
    while(exp)
    {
        if(exp&1)
        {
            res=matMult(res,Base);
        }
        Base=matMult(Base,Base);
        exp=exp>>1;
    }
    return res;
}
int main()
{
    int T;
    cin>>T;
    while(T--)
    {
        LLI n;
        cin>>n;
        if(n!=0)
        {
            matrix base;
            base.a=2;base.b=3;base.c=1;
            base.d=0;
            matrix ans=pow(base,n-1);
            cout<<(5*ans.a+2*ans.b)%mod<<endl;
        }
        else
            cout<<"2\n";
    }
}
